nodes.text: The Dwartii system was a star system located in the Allied Region known as Nouane.

The Dwartii system was first mentioned in the 2005 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, in a section written by Kerrie Dougherty focusing on locations from Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. It was later identified in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
